HeroMission.Hero_Story_Parent: [Npc:Icon chara="Dummy"/][UE:Meta key="44e75423567a4ba18038c3f2980663db" Scale="1"/]从行星逃脱吧
HeroMission.Hero_Story_Parent_Purpose: [Npc:Icon chara="Dummy"/][UE:Meta key="fb448ca5ed3b44a89f59c164c7bbca98" Scale="1"/]回收宇宙船零件
HeroMission.Hero_UnlockArea002_Child_01_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="35bdc3c445384fabb3a2b64ad0195ff1" Scale="1"/]回收[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]{NextNum}个宇宙船零件[System:Color name="Default"]
修复多露芬号的话，
一定能够提升引擎的功率吧⋯⋯
HeroMission.Hero_UnlockArea003_Child_02_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="d0473eda61a04f0691f65e602803b017" Scale="1"/]要扩大可探索的区域，
必须回收[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]{NextNum}个宇宙船零件[System:Color name="Default"]⋯⋯
HeroMission.Hero_UnlockArea010_Child_03_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="07cebef3c2f7476380119c012db49cac" Scale="1"/]要进一步提升多露芬号的飞行距离，
需要[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]{NextNum}个宇宙船零件[System:Color name="Default"]⋯⋯
HeroMission.Hero_UnlockEnding_Child_04_Info:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="7d081c2d36b745a7ae5be58d348812ce" Scale="1"/]如果回收全部[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]{NextNum}个宇宙船零件[System:Color name="Default"]的话，
就一定能够从这个行星逃脱！
HeroMission.Hero_UnlockEnding_Child_04_Purpose: [Npc:Icon chara="Dummy"/][UE:Meta key="cc9bef0af3ee4280b831d122dad8ac4b" Scale="1"/]回收全部的宇宙船零件
